GSD.description:
ocfs2: mount fails with buffer overflow in strlen

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.288 by commit 4b74ddcc22ee6455946e80a9c4808801f8f8561e. For more details please see the references link.
